reviewText: My toddler loves this show, it's kinda hard finding it on DVD, and not paying a lot of money for it, I'm thankful we found one that wasn't expensive.

As soon as I saw this DVD I knew I had to have it. I had seen Daniel Cook on TV so I knew I liked his videos. I have really enjoyed watching the 12 videos on this 72-minute DVD. I highly recommend this DVD for adults and children. I absolutely love Daniel Cook.
